name: 1Fin by IndigoLearn
description: IndigoLearn is Indias First Full Stack Ed-Tech Startup that is focused solely on Finance & Accounting Domains. On our Free App - 1Fin, students and professionals in the Finance & Accounting domains can access high quality content, interact and network with each other, clear their doubts, prepare for examinations & stay updated on latest news / events. Currently 1Fin is focused on Students of CA, CMA & CS based out of India. With several 1000s of MCQs & the first in India feature of CA firm rating by Articled clerks / Interns & an e-store, 1Fin aims to be the one-stop destination for all student requirements.  Study on the Go  With increased access data and presence of a smart phone learners can now enroll in our courses online just at the click of a button, watch them anywhere & anytime on the go and on any device ( Mobile / Laptop ? Tablet) . Our content is specifically designed for students who wish to watch in on the move. With multiple speed options, ability to auto conserve bandwidth by adjusting the quality, our goal is always to help and support students wherever they are.   Learn Like Never Before One of core beliefs is that we should help students like Learn Like Never Before. Our Story based pedagogy and visual representation are designed to make the student understand the concept well and remember them ever better. Our aim is to move the students away from rote memorization to conceptual understanding and we love to do that in the best way possible.   Unlimited Views And the best part of our course modules are they can be watched unlimited number of times without any limitation on our part as long as it is by same user and in a limited number of devices. We believe that Artificial constraints of limitation in views are plain Student Unfriendly and need to be done away with in todays day and age.    Coolest Way to Learn  We make learning fun and seriously engaging. Our goal is to make dry and complex topics all the more fun and interesting. We use Visual effects, interesting real-life stories and faculty with a penchant for giving their best to achieve these end objectives. We like to call ourselves Cool Accountants.  Pay with any thing  Pay with whatever you like, Debit Card / Credit Card / UPI / E Wallets / BHIM, net banking and every other payment feature available to a user. Please not we do not accept International cards & American Express Credit / Charge Cards as of now. We are working on making these also available very shortly   Credits & Coupons  We have some of the best credits and coupon management programs. Refer a friend and whenever your friend enrolls you get a few credits and when she / he make a purchase you get a lot of credits. You can use the credits to buy courses on our app. For additional details refer our T&C   Follows us on FB / YouTube / Insta / Twitter  instagram.com/indigolearn/  https://in.linkedin.com/company/indigolearn  https://www.facebook.com/IndigoLearn  https://www.youtube.com/indigolearn  https://twitter.com/indigolearn
